name: An Other day
description:
For the Full Moon Jam July 2020.  Thematic"Time Travel".

To Move use on your KeyBoard the keys "W"  "A"  "S"  "D" or the arrows keys. You can accelerate or slow the speed a little or  move left and right. Use the "SpaceBar" to fly a little (Yes, i know, it's cool).You can only return home after charging the time energy to 419, no time to fix that before the end of the Jam.  After that use "alt" + "F4" on your Keyboard.

Les Français peuvent utiliser les touches "z" "q" "s" "d" pour bouger ,ralentir un peu, ou accélérer ou les touche fléchées a la place ."Barre espace" pour voler au dessus du sol un moment. "alt"+"F4" en même temps pour quitter la machine temporelle quand vous avez fini.

Why the Time Travel Machine can only travel one time?

True Story. I didn't make my time machine in 2 weeks like the other mad scientists of the Full Moon Jam, but only in 3 days, because i was busy. I repaired and launched my Time Travel Machine just before midnight the 12 july 2020, just few seconds before the deadline. But unfortunatly you can only travel one time and come back . You can travel time  by charging the time energy to 140. Unfortunatly i made a mistake and i thought i was lost in time but i came back and you can come back too.  You can return to your time only with time energy at 419, and after that my time machine is broken.Sorry but you will need to quit the Broken Time Travel Machine by pusching the "Alt"  +" F4" Keys at the same Time.

Good Luck. I know that you will not like to beeing lost in space time 3 minutes on my broken machine but you will return Home and i will repair it.

Graphic assets "Polygon" by "Synthy Studio". Music by someone (free music, I will find his name later).

Programing  and Procedural generation By Jack Mordred.

Sunset programming and choose of the ground. Jack Mordred

All other things. By Jack Mordred.
